amendment.description: To require a strategic human capital plan for civilian employees of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1325 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1325 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S8545; text: CR S8545) To require a strategic human capital plan for civilian employees of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1325 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1325 proposed by Senator Levin.
